name: Compromise Accounts - Email Accounts (T1586.002)
description: Detects suspicious activity potentially indicating attempts to compromise email accounts. This includes failed logins, unauthorized mailbox access, and token-based sign-ins.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: (process.args:(*outlook* OR *exchange* OR *imap* OR *smtp* OR *m365* OR *gmail.com* OR *access_token* OR *refresh_token*) AND event.outcome:failure) OR (event.dataset:email.authentication AND event.outcome:failure)
